Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hidefensin 1 (natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S; UCSS1a; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (73.17%) toinsect defensin LSer-Def3GRAVY: 0.287; Mol formula:  C170H291N51O50S6; M. Wt: 4054.873, and Mol ex coeff.: 1865.Activity:  both deffusion and microdilution methods were used. Active against E. coli (MIC 30-60 ug/ml) and S. aureus (MIC 15-30 ug/ml) but not Salmonella spp. (MIC > 100 ug/ml). Warning: activity was tested using the TRX fusion peptide (TRX protein itself was inactive).
Literature Information.Author: Zhang J, Li J, Peng Y, Gao X, Song Q, Zhang H, Elhag O, Cai M, Zheng L, Yu Z, Zhang J.2021
Literature Information.Title: Structural and functional characterizations and heterogenous expression of the antimicrobial peptides, Hidefensins, from black soldier fly, Hermetia illucens (L.).
